Grate
brazilwood
very finely, put it to soak one or two
hours
in
clear water
, then take this
tinted water
& add to it some
clear water
& you will make
e
wine
as claret colored as you like. If you please, put a
drop
of
lemon
or
orange
juice
in it & it will immediately turn white. It can be drunk without danger.
